content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Denver Parks and Recreation </origin>         <pubdate>20110413</pubdate>         <title>Park Restrooms</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This dataset is a point representation of permanent restroom facilities in parks and other areas maintained by the Department of Parks and Recreation in the City and County of Denver.</abstract>       <purpose>This dataset should be used as reference to locate permanent restroom facilities in parks and other areas maintained by the Department of Parks and Recreation in the City and County of Denver. The data should be used for planning and design purposes and cartographic purposes only.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <progress>Complete</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.110037</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.734005</eastbc>         <northbc>39.825192</northbc>         <southbc>39.612661</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>Restroom</themekey>         <themekey>Parks</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  This dataset is provided as read-only and is restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only.  Contact the GIS Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.  USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and mployees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES  </useconst>     <datacred>Denver Parks and Recreation</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>RESTRICT - 1</secsys>       <secclass>Restricted</secclass>       <sechandl>Read access to all city users via LVM (Locate View Map). Data available to those with access to SDE layers.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>Entity point</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>56</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>park_restrooms</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LOCATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Name of the park or maintained area.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LOC_CODE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal unique identifier for the park or maintained area.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>HEATED</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Is the restroom heated and open year round - yes or no domain.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>YEAR_BUILT</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Year in which the restroom structure was built.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>YEAR_REHAB</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Year in which the restroom facility was renovated or updated.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NOTES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Any applicable comments regarding the restroom facility.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / DenverGIS Data</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>US</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am -
